idea-plugin.name: Git File Checkout
idea-plugin.description:
Checkout a single file from any branch or commit hash. The file contents are replaced in-place as an unstaged modification (undoable with Cmd+Z).
Usage: Open a file, press Cmd+Shift+A, type "Checkout File from Branch", select a branch or enter a commit hash.

action.description: Replace the current file with its contents from another branch or commit
